attributes.name: Earth Battered Axe
attributes.description: "This axe has seen better days after being carried all around the world."
attributes.parsed_description: "This axe has seen better days after being carried all around the world."

attributes.name: Earthbinder Ward
attributes.description: "In all things there are cycles. The Earthbinder Ward helps break them."
attributes.parsed_description: "In all things there are cycles. The Earthbinder Ward helps break them."

attributes.name: Earthen Smasher
attributes.description: “You laugh, but I just saw a dryad use this 'rock on a stick' to smash our scout into the ground.”
attributes.parsed_description: “You laugh, but I just saw a dryad use this 'rock on a stick' to smash our scout into the ground.”

attributes.name: Earth Imbued Staff
attributes.description: "Let nature into your heart and it shall heal your wounds."
attributes.parsed_description: "Let nature into your heart and it shall heal your wounds."

attributes.name: Earth Rejuvenated
attributes.description: "After the slumber of winter, the world awakes refreshed, as life springs forth anew."
attributes.parsed_description: "After the slumber of winter, the world awakes refreshed, as life springs forth anew."

attributes.name: Earths' Essence
attributes.description: "A gift from a Dryad earth warden, this staff is imbued with the essence of a thousand dryad spirits."
attributes.parsed_description: "A gift from a Dryad earth warden, this staff is imbued with the essence of a thousand dryad spirits."

attributes.name: Earthshaker
attributes.description: "This will teach you how the mighty fall."
attributes.parsed_description: "This will teach you how the mighty fall."

attributes.name: Earthspike
attributes.description: "Coated in a fine poison. Pain is all your enemies shall know."
attributes.parsed_description: "Coated in a fine poison. Pain is all your enemies shall know."

attributes.name: Ebon Rain
attributes.description: "The black arrows of the Corrupted armies are a warning of the bloodshed that is to come."
attributes.parsed_description: "The black arrows of the Corrupted armies are a warning of the bloodshed that is to come."

attributes.name: Echoes of War
attributes.description: "I fought valiently, and yet they are gone. Have I failed?"
attributes.parsed_description: "I fought valiently, and yet they are gone. Have I failed?"

attributes.name: Echo of Grace
attributes.description: "Walk in my footsteps, and I will show you my mistakes."
attributes.parsed_description: "Walk in my footsteps, and I will show you my mistakes."

attributes.name: Edenbow
attributes.description: A Bow, given as a gift after fighting the Dryads in Edengrove.
attributes.parsed_description: A Bow, given as a gift after fighting the Dryads in Edengrove.

attributes.name: Edengrove's Hope
attributes.description: "Stand with nature and defend her. For she is pure of heart and gives hope to all around her."
attributes.parsed_description: "Stand with nature and defend her. For she is pure of heart and gives hope to all around her."

attributes.name: Edenil
attributes.description: "From the earth we came, to the earth we shall return."
attributes.parsed_description: "From the earth we came, to the earth we shall return."

attributes.name: Eden's Kiss
attributes.description: "A gift of the garden to protect against those who would slip past your guard."
attributes.parsed_description: "A gift of the garden to protect against those who would slip past your guard."

attributes.name: Edentide
attributes.description: "The waters of Reekwater seem to react to the staff as it passes near them. Curious."
attributes.parsed_description: "The waters of Reekwater seem to react to the staff as it passes near them. Curious."

attributes.name: Edge of Rebellion
attributes.description: "For the guts and glory."
attributes.parsed_description: "For the guts and glory."

attributes.name: Edmand's Fishing Spear
attributes.description: "Perfect for spear fishing against small fish, sharks, and whales. Though maybe don't try to take down a kraken with this."
attributes.parsed_description: "Perfect for spear fishing against small fish, sharks, and whales. Though maybe don't try to take down a kraken with this."

attributes.name: Effervescence
attributes.description: "Take a deep breath. Find the darkness within yourself, and let a boiling rage fill your heart."
attributes.parsed_description: "Take a deep breath. Find the darkness within yourself, and let a boiling rage fill your heart."

attributes.name: Elegant Hunting Rifle
attributes.description: "The perfect proportions and weight for a sport hunter."
attributes.parsed_description: "The perfect proportions and weight for a sport hunter."

attributes.name: Elegant Lamplighter
attributes.description: "Light the village and keep the dark things away."
attributes.parsed_description: "Light the village and keep the dark things away."

attributes.name: Elegant Stick
attributes.description: "A whitled down stick used by children as a rapier. It's sharp enough to be somewhat dangerous."
attributes.parsed_description: "A whitled down stick used by children as a rapier. It's sharp enough to be somewhat dangerous."

attributes.name: Emberstrike
attributes.description: "Forged in the depths of Shattered Mountain, this sword appears as if it is molten lava bound together by some unknown magic."
attributes.parsed_description: "Forged in the depths of Shattered Mountain, this sword appears as if it is molten lava bound together by some unknown magic."

attributes.name: Emerald's Eye
attributes.description: "Crafted from a colossal emerald, this weapon hardly seems practical."
attributes.parsed_description: "Crafted from a colossal emerald, this weapon hardly seems practical."

attributes.name: Empowered Flintlock
attributes.description: "A mage once casted dozens of spells on this musket trying to make himself the world's best shot. While he failed miserably at that, he did succeed at enchanting the weapon."
attributes.parsed_description: "A mage once casted dozens of spells on this musket trying to make himself the world's best shot. While he failed miserably at that, he did succeed at enchanting the weapon."

attributes.name: Empowered Great Axe
attributes.description: "The Archmage always did say to enchant your weapons."
attributes.parsed_description: "The Archmage always did say to enchant your weapons."

attributes.name: Enchanted Crystal Warhammer
attributes.description: "Magic gems imbued in the head of the hammer add a mystical element to an already formidable weapon."
attributes.parsed_description: "Magic gems imbued in the head of the hammer add a mystical element to an already formidable weapon."

attributes.name: Enchanted Flame Staff
attributes.description: "Chaotic magic flows through the staff, ferociously seeking an outlet."
attributes.parsed_description: "Chaotic magic flows through the staff, ferociously seeking an outlet."

attributes.name: Enchanted Life Staff
attributes.description: "Blessed by the wilds which you must save."
attributes.parsed_description: "Blessed by the wilds which you must save."

attributes.name: Enchanted Longbow
attributes.description: "The strings vibrate as your fingers run up and down them. Magical energies are imbued deep within the sinew."
attributes.parsed_description: "The strings vibrate as your fingers run up and down them. Magical energies are imbued deep within the sinew."

attributes.name: Enchanted Maul
attributes.description: "Humming with magical energies, this warhammer was forged in the depths of the Starstone Barrows long ago."
attributes.parsed_description: "Humming with magical energies, this warhammer was forged in the depths of the Starstone Barrows long ago."

attributes.name: Enchanted Sabre
attributes.description: "A mage blessed the metal before it was forged, leaving a magically imbued blade that presents a danger to all."
attributes.parsed_description: "A mage blessed the metal before it was forged, leaving a magically imbued blade that presents a danger to all."

attributes.name: Enchantress
attributes.description: "This sword was given to me by your mother, whose mother gave it to her, and so on, since before the books kept track of such things."
attributes.parsed_description: "This sword was given to me by your mother, whose mother gave it to her, and so on, since before the books kept track of such things."

attributes.name: Endless Void
attributes.description: “My wrath is as endless as the void. I shall never stop hunting you.”
attributes.parsed_description: “My wrath is as endless as the void. I shall never stop hunting you.”

attributes.name: End of Days
attributes.description: "Don't celebrate yet. This is only the beginning."
attributes.parsed_description: "Don't celebrate yet. This is only the beginning."

attributes.name: End of Tyranny
attributes.description: "Despots rule only so long as their people are unable to rise up."
attributes.parsed_description: "Despots rule only so long as their people are unable to rise up."

attributes.name: Energized Ancient Rapier
attributes.description: "The blade reverberates when it strikes metal."
attributes.parsed_description: "The blade reverberates when it strikes metal."

attributes.name: Energized Warhammer
attributes.description: "Magic energy of some sort flows through the hammer, rejuvenating those who wield it."
attributes.parsed_description: "Magic energy of some sort flows through the hammer, rejuvenating those who wield it."

attributes.name: Enforcer's Battleaxe
attributes.description: "Do as I say."
attributes.parsed_description: "Do as I say."

attributes.name: Enigmatic Aeons
attributes.description: "Run your finger along the blade. Can you feel it pulse with the stars themselves?"
attributes.parsed_description: "Run your finger along the blade. Can you feel it pulse with the stars themselves?"
